entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 2000 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
